title: His Last Gift
description: Katherine pines for her lost lover, who has unexpectedly abandoned her. She has no information of his whereabouts. He left no message as to why. Her parents, ashamed of her wanton behavior, have locked her away.Will Katherine see Daniel again? Will she ever discover why he left her?A short story romance about star-crossed lovers. Rated mature for an explicit scene, possibly objectable material. 4500+ with a surprise ending. Shh... I won't tell if you won't.
author: Jacqueline Patricks
